concept.title: Sending Documents for eSignature with Power Sign

othermeta.name: title
othermeta.content: Sending Documents for eSignature with Power Sign

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Explains how to send contract documents and supporting files for eSignature using Power Sign, including selecting documents, choosing recipients, setting signing order, and finalizing the signing process.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: contract document;supporting documents;recipient list;signing order;email subject;email message;power sign console

conbody.p: After generating a contract document, you can use Cong Sign to send that document, along with any supporting documents for eSignature. In order to send documents for eSignature, you can use documents already attached to the record and select the documents from the list of available documents. You can select multiple documents for signing within a single request. Then, you select recipients, set the signing order, customize the subject and message of the email, and finalize the document in Power Sign.
